value.stringValue: Hello! You have just moved your Opportunity from the stage 'Solution' to 'Proposal'.... Congrats! Please review the current value you have for Expected Services ({![Opportunity].Expected_Services__c}) and make sure this is correct before proceeding.

rules.name: Yes16
rules.conditionLogic: 1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8

formulas.name: subjectformula

value.stringValue: Task created after Opportunity being closed won. Please plan/action accordingly!
